event_phase.caption_pedestrian: The pedestrian, a male in his 30s with a height of 170 cm, was wearing a white jacket and black slacks. He also had a white hat on his head. The environment was clear and bright, with a dry asphalt road. The pedestrian was closely watching his surroundings, being almost aware of the vehicle approaching him. His body was oriented in the opposite direction to the vehicle, and he was directly in front of it. The pedestrian's line of sight was focused on the vehicle. Despite being in close proximity to the vehicle, the pedestrian's visual status allowed him to observe his surroundings without any hindrance. Walking in front of the vehicle, the pedestrian was thrown back suddenly, presumably due to an unexpected impact or collision. The event took place on a two-way traffic residential road with street lights present.
event_phase.caption_vehicle: The vehicle was positioned in front of the pedestrian, at a close relative distance. The pedestrian was visible within the vehicle's field of view. Unfortunately, the vehicle collided with the pedestrian while stationary at a speed of 0 km/h. The event took place in a clear weather condition with bright brightness. The road surface was dry and level with asphalt. It occurred on a residential road that had two-way traffic and lacked sidewalks on both sides. Additionally, there were no roadside strips on both sides of the road, but street lights were present. The environment conditions surrounding the event included a male pedestrian in his 30s who was 170 cm tall and wearing a white hat. He had a white jacket on his upper body and black slacks on his lower body. Overall, the traffic volume was usual during the incident.
